name: Preview Sega Saturn Vol. 1
overview: Preview Sega Saturn Vol. 1 is a demo disc bundled with Sega Saturn consoles in France (and possibly elsewhere). There was no "volume 2", although the early Sega Flash demo discs use the same menu system. Playable demos included: Alien Trilogy Tomb Raider Exhumed Loaded NHL Powerplay '96 Keio Flying Squadron 2
